diff --git a/lib/list.js b/lib/list.js
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+function shuffle(lst) {
+  for (var i = lst.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
+    var j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i+1));
+    var tmp = lst[i];
+    lst[i] = lst[j];
+    lst[j] = tmp;
+  }
+  return lst;
+}
+
+module.exports.shuffle = shuffle;
